name: Eye for an Icecream - Bloody Cartoon Mayhem
name_original: Eye for an Icecream - Bloody Cartoon Mayhem
description:
Once upon a time, Rhino the squirrel owned a little ice cream stall in the woods. He catered for all his critter friends on sunny days when they wanted a sweet treat.

But one day, the enemies from across the border came along and destroyed everything in their path, and stole Rhino's stock from the stall! Rhino was left without a friend, and without his ice cream.

Help Rhino take his vengeance on the evil critter baddies and retrieve his ice cream stock!

- VENGEFUL CRITTER ADVENTURE
Prepare to destroy everything in your path to get vengeance: an eye for an eye!

- BLOODY CARTOON VIOLENCE!
Messy blood-splattering thrills

- INTENSE BOSS BATTLES!
Take on the evil critters who brutalised Rhino's friends and took his ice cream stock

- LOADS OF WEAPONS TO SWITCH BETWEEN!
Choose from a kitchen knife, a machine gun, a deadly acorn, and more

- THREE MODES OF PLAY!
Develop your skill of playing in Normal, Sleep, and Rage modes

Like the game? Join us on Facebook! facebook.com/EyeForAnIceCream
